title: How to write a research proposal with the APA format - Quora

response.answer_text: Write your proposal in Microsoft Word. For APA itself, you can learn about them here: APA StyleGeneral Format // Purdue Writing LabWhen you come to insert citations, etc., in Word, click on References on the menu bar and then click on the Style dropdown and select APA; it’s listed there, by default.  Whenever you need to add a source, insert a reference, a works’ cited, etc., they will automatically be formatted for APA:
